title: Rito, thank you SO MUCH for the new lore!
body:
Seriously. I love you guys now. This is amazing and such a great introduction to all the lore that I know is waiting for us *wink wink*.

Signed,
someone who was depressed when old lore was retconned.

replies.body: We've got a long path ahead, but we're looking forward to the journey. Thanks for the kind words, and yes, there will be more.

Great job on the recent lores. I haven't read them all but the kindred one and the Fiora one were both great.
I hope Summoners Rift get's rebuild with Lore.. it all died out, inststitute of war?
